document.full_text: israel on wednesday reopened a commercial crossing with the hamas-ruled gaza strip that was shut for seven days, as a lull in cross-border fighting continued, an israeli spokesman said.
document.title: israel reopens gaza crossing shut during fighting
lines_and_colors: israel on wednesday reopened a commercial crossing with the hamas-ruled gaza strip that was shut for seven days, as a lull in cross-border fighting continued, an israeli spokesman said.
